name: Psycho Zombies
description:
The apocalypse is upon us and you are one of the few that is not infected, if you want to stay alive you need to fight ard and well, no room for misstakes if you wan´t to live!
Choose from multiple gun options, find out all zombies and kill them all!
You are a bad ass and it´s time to show everyone that you can survive this,
its unclera if you or the zombies are the psycho, however its pretty clear that if you don´t pull the trigger,
you will be zombie dinner before noon!

360 degree 3D zombie shooter game of the year

Special thanks to PITBULLFARM for the music in the game, play it, listen and enjoy of the big hit game combined with awesome music!

PSYCHO ZOMBIES - Let´s start the killing
